## Description {#details}

A derived class of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> that initializes itself according to a given <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config">Config</a> object.

The purpose of this class is to tie ownership of the diagnostic handler to the context, as opposed to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config">Config</a> object (which may be ephemeral).

Definition at line 299 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/config-h">Config.h</a>.
